HANDCRAFTED SCULPTURAL CANDLES MADE WITH A NATURAL SOY WAX BLEND

Each candle is individually hand poured in Sydney, Australia. Our philosophy is to create geometric forms that are inspired by the play of light and shadows. A family of sculptural pieces that will warm your home
